block.p: FRANKS-June, On August 28, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Lawrence. Loving mother of Roberta, David and Michael. Devoted grandmother of Laurie and Larry. Dear sister of Grace Rothstein and Honey Rosen. Services today 12:45 PM at ''The Riverside'', 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue.
FRANKS-June. Wife of the late Larry; mother, grandma, sister, aunt, friend, attorney, judge. June A Little Bit Goodman, at peace at last. Elaine
